name: NIjobs.com
tag_list: recruitment, online-recruitment, job-site, jobs-in-ni, jobs-in-northern-ireland, jobs-in-belfast
overview:
Established in 2000, NIjobs.com is the number one recruitment website in Northern Ireland with 239,410 high quality jobseekers logging on every month. NIjobs.com has its head office in Belfast and is part of Saongroup.com one of the fastest growing online companies in the world.

Our mission is to continuously deliver a high quality platform to enable recruiters to advertise their vacancies within any industry sector and to enable jobseekers to find their dream career.

ABC audit figures confirm NIjobs.com is Northern Ireland’s number one audited recruitment website.

239,410 different career seekers logging on every month (ABCe January 2012).

404,487 visits per month (ABC January 2012).

Founded in 2000; our sister company IrishJobs.ie is the market leader in Ireland.

NIjobs.com is part of saongroup.com, one of the fastest online recruitment companies globally, which means that you can find a job or recruit from anywhere in the world. With global operations in 15 markets and presence in 27 countries saongroup.com has over 500 websites in its portfolio.
